name: Outlaw Leader
description: Charismatic and cunning, the outlaw leader commands ragged bands who survive beyond the reach of the law.
strengths: Inspires nearby outlaws, skilled duelist, battlefield awareness.
weaknesses: Pride blinds judgment, overconfident in numbers.

name: Enforcer
description: A brute who relies on raw strength and intimidation to crush foes into submission.
strengths: High physical power, grappling, brutal melee attacks.

name: Outlaw Trapper
description: Patient and cruel, the trapper sets ambushes with nets, snares, and concealed hazards.
strengths: Disables enemies with nets and tripwires, area control.
weaknesses: Poor in open combat, relies heavily on preparation.

name: Outlaw Illusionist
description: A rogue mage who bends light and thought to deceive and distract, often for coin or survival.
strengths: Illusions for concealment, crowd confusion, versatile spellcasting.
weaknesses: Fragile in melee, illusions collapse under scrutiny.

name: Outlaw Healer
description: A survivalist cleric tending wounds in exchange for loyalty, coin, or protection.
strengths: Healing magic, support spells, bolsters alliesâ€™ resolve.
weaknesses: Defenseless when isolated, limited offensive ability.

name: Fesk the Grimekeeper
description: A sewer-dweller who trades scavenged trinkets and local secrets for food or stories.
strengths: Knows every tunnel, skilled at surviving underground.
weaknesses: Physically frail, motivated by greed and paranoia.

name: Iron Golem Sentinel
description: A massive war machine left dormant in the sewers, designed to annihilate intruders.
strengths: Nigh-invulnerable armor, poison breath, immense strength.
weaknesses: Sluggish, vulnerable to lightning or control magic.

name: Gelatinous Cube
description: A translucent cube of acidic slime that silently engulfs everything in its path.
strengths: Paralyzing engulf, dissolves weapons and flesh.
weaknesses: Slow, obvious once spotted, weak to fire and cold.

name: Sewer Mimic
description: A shape-shifting predator lurking as pipes, doors, or debris, striking when least expected.
strengths: Perfect camouflage, surprise grapples, adhesive form.
weaknesses: Fire disrupts disguise, cannot pursue far.

name: Illythid Stalker
description: A towering, bat-like predator from another plane. It uses a grotesque forehead organ to channel destructive sound magic.
strengths: Sonic roars, echolocation blinds foes, highly intelligent tactics.
weaknesses: Vulnerable if its sonar organ is damaged, overextends when hunting prey.

name: Silver Knight
description: A spider-like animated armor, twisted by forgotten wards to patrol abandoned tunnels.
strengths: Fast climbing, arcane-infused strikes, relentless pursuit.
weaknesses: Outdated programming, can be tricked or overloaded.

name: Velashra
description: Cunning mastermind of the Black Fangs, Velashra wields brutal magic and ruthless strategy to crush opposition.
strengths: Terrifying spellcaster, manipulative, commands monstrous minions.
weaknesses: Arrogance blinds her, relies on pawns to weaken enemies first.
